name: get_web_detection
description: Detects web information for a given image using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

image.description: The URL of the image to be analyzed.

name: nsfw_image_classification
description: Classifies whether the image content at the given URL is inappropriate or not using the NSFW Image Classification API.

link.description: The URL of the image to be analyzed.

name: get_label_detection
description: This function interacts with the RapidAPI Label Detection service to get label information for a given image URL.

image.description: The URL of the image to be analyzed.

name: get_person_by_id
description: Fetches the information of a person from the system using their `person_id`.

person_id.description: The unique identifier of the person whose information is to be retrieved.

name: get_media_info
description: Retrieve information about a media item from Instagram API by providing the media ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the media item to retrieve information for.

name: keywords
description: Fetches keywords from a given text using the AI Writer API.

content_type.description: The content type of the text (e.g. 'application/json').

text.description: The text from which to extract keywords.

name: get_info_from_vin
description: Retrieves vehicle information from a VIN (Vehicle Identification Number) using the RapidAPI service.

vin.description: The Vehicle Identification Number to decode.
